mapper.insert: insert into order ( order_id, order_code, order_type, order_goods_price, order_service_price, order_goods_size, ticket_code, ticket_price, coupon_code, coupon_price, order_message, pay_price, user_id, receive_name, receive_mobile, receive_address, receive_expect_begin_time, receive_expect_end_time, status, gmt_create, gmt_modify ) values ( #{orderId}, #{orderCode}, #{orderType}, #{orderGoodsPrice}, #{orderServicePrice}, #{orderGoodsSize}, #{ticketCode}, #{ticketPrice}, #{couponCode}, #{couponPrice}, #{orderMessage}, #{payPrice}, #{userId}, #{receiveName}, #{receiveMobile}, #{receiveAddress}, #{receiveExpectBeginTime}, #{receiveExpectEndTime}, #{receiveExpectTime}, #{status}, now(6), now(6) )
